plot: Rake is on a quest to find the Magical Sombrero. With the help of his guide, Chancellor Oji, Rake must use both strength and intelligence to defeat those who have turned against him.
title: The Quest for the Magical Sombrero
plot_es: Rake is on a quest to find the Magical Sombrero. With the help of his guide, Chancellor Oji, Rake must use both strength and intelligence to defeat those who have turned against him.
original_name: The Quest for the Magical Sombrero
plot_en: Rake is on a quest to find the Magical Sombrero. With the help of his guide, Chancellor Oji, Rake must use both strength and intelligence to defeat those who have turned against him.
